title: Eventually Good Advice with Justin Long
itunes:title: Eventually Good Advice with Justin Long
description:
Justin Long joins Chelsea to talk about mistaken identities, falling in love, and the underappreciated value of a Smartcar.  Then: A 19-year-old wants to step outside her relationship for some sexploration.  A sommelier struggles with her dad’s wedding one-upmanship.  And a wife stumbles across some unexpected sexts on her husbands phone. 

Do you need advice from Chelsea? Send us your question at: DearChelseaProject@gmail.com

 

*

Executive Producer Nick Stumpf

Produced by Catherine Law

Edited & Engineered by Brandon Dickert

*

*

*

*

Guests and listeners should not rely on matters discussed in the Podcast and shall not act or shall refrain from acting based on information contained in the Podcast without first seeking independent medical advice.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
